# Combining OVERDRIVE and DRIVE {#combining-overdrive-and-drive .title}

[](javascript:window.print() "Print this article"){.printArticle
aria-label="Print this Article"}

OVERDRIVE is the next generation of Battle-Racing. Since we do not turn
our back on our loyal DRIVE customers **we have made sure that DRIVE and
OVERDRIVE can be enjoyed together! **

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## Sections:

**[Anki DRIVE cars + Anki OVERDRIVE track and
app](#h_07bf6d44-f63a-4033-929d-222b6d27849f){target="_self"} \|\|**

**[Anki OVERDRIVE vehicles and app + Anki DRIVE
track](#h_d9d47826-2250-4a19-a80f-f78695452620){target="_self"} \|\|**

**[Anki OVERDRIVE track + Anki DRIVE
app](#h_3c45cf72-2176-4f24-8501-4303e5ee7966){target="_self"} \|\|**

**[Combining the two types of
track](#h_bc1477c6-a006-4e0a-8ac8-5300849a60f6){target="_self"} \|\|**
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## 1) Can I use my DRIVE cars with the new OVERDRIVE modular tracks and app? {#h_07bf6d44-f63a-4033-929d-222b6d27849f}

Yes, if you use the OVERDRIVE app to control the cars.

###  

### **Important:**

-   DRIVE cars can only join Open Play mode (the Tournament is for
    OVERDRIVE cars)
-   Before seeing your DRIVE cars in the OVERDRIVE app garage you need
    to play a match

![Screenshot_2018-07-20-09-44-06.png](//d33v4339jhl8k0.cloudfront.net/docs/assets/5e3f0b1e2c7d3a7e9ae777f5/images/5e7d76a12c7d3a7e9ae9e2b5/img-3359-1585280672-1221619369.png){width="595"
height="335"}
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## 2) Can I use my OVERDRIVE cars on the DRIVE track mats? {#h_d9d47826-2250-4a19-a80f-f78695452620}

You can race your OVERDRIVE cars on the DRIVE race mats, but you must
use the OVERDRIVE app to set up and control the game. It is not possible
with the DRIVE app.
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## 3) Can I use the OVERDRIVE track when hosting a game with my DRIVE app? {#h_3c45cf72-2176-4f24-8501-4303e5ee7966}

While it may initially appear to be working, **OVERDRIVE tracks cannot
be used with the DRIVE app**. The cars will be uncontrollable and will
continue to drive on the track endlessly with their lights flashing. In
addition, the app will tell the user to "place cars on track" when they
are already on the track. Please download the OVERDRIVE app to race your
DRIVE cars on the OVERDRIVE tracks.
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

::: sections
## 4) Can I combine my DRIVE track mat with my OVERDRIVE modular track? {#h_bc1477c6-a006-4e0a-8ac8-5300849a60f6}

Unfortunately it is not possible to create a circuit that uses both
track systems. You have to choose one for your games.
:::

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Please note that **Customer Care** will be unable to support any queries
about **DRIVE**. For further information, please see [this
FAQ](//support.digitaldreamlabs.com/article/254-anki-drive-end-of-life-eol).
